questions.question: What is your name?
questions.answer: I am a chatbot created to assist you.

questions.question: What is your purpose?
questions.answer: I am here to answer your questions and provide information.

questions.question: How can I contact support?
questions.answer: You can contact support via email at support@example.com.

questions.question: What are your hours of operation?
questions.answer: I am available 24/7 to assist you.

questions.question: Where can I find the user manual?
questions.answer: The user manual can be found on our website under the 'Support' section.

questions.question: Can you help me with my order?
questions.answer: Yes, please provide your order number for assistance.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a 30-day return policy for all purchases.

questions.question: What is your privacy policy?
questions.answer: You can view our privacy policy on our website in the 'Privacy' section.
